00036 #ifndef ABSTRACTELEMENT_HPP_
00037 #define ABSTRACTELEMENT_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include <vector>
00040 
00041 #include "UblasVectorInclude.hpp"
00042 #include "Node.hpp"
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * When creating an element within a mesh one needs to specify its global index.
00046  * If the element is not used within a mesh the following constant is used instead.
00047  */
00048 const unsigned INDEX_IS_NOT_USED=0;
00049 
00053 template <unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00054 class AbstractElement
00055 {
00056 protected:
00057 
00059     std::vector<Node<SPACE_DIM>*> mNodes;
00060 
00062     unsigned mIndex;
00063 
00065     double mAttribute;
00066 
00071     bool mIsDeleted;
00072 
00074     bool mOwnership;
00075 
00077     bool mFlag;
00078 
00079 public:
00080 
00087     AbstractElement(unsigned index, const std::vector<Node<SPACE_DIM>*>& rNodes);
00088 
00094     AbstractElement(unsigned index=INDEX_IS_NOT_USED);
00095 
00100     virtual ~AbstractElement()
00101     {}
00102 
00109     virtual void UpdateNode(const unsigned& rIndex, Node<SPACE_DIM>* pNode)=0;
00110 
00117     void ReplaceNode(Node<SPACE_DIM>* pOldNode, Node<SPACE_DIM>* pNewNode);
00118 
00123     virtual void MarkAsDeleted()=0;
00124 
00128     virtual void RegisterWithNodes()=0;
00129 
00138     double GetNodeLocation(unsigned localIndex, unsigned dimension) const;
00139 
00146     c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM> GetNodeLocation(unsigned localIndex) const;
00147 
00155     unsigned GetNodeGlobalIndex(unsigned localIndex) const;
00156 
00163     Node<SPACE_DIM>* GetNode(unsigned localIndex) const;
00164 
00168     unsigned GetNumNodes() const;
00169 
00175     void AddNode(Node<SPACE_DIM>* pNode);
00176 
00182     bool IsDeleted() const;
00183 
00187     unsigned GetIndex() const;
00188 
00194     void SetIndex(unsigned index);
00195 
00199     bool GetOwnership() const;
00200 
00206     void SetOwnership(bool ownership);
00207 
00211     void Flag();
00212 
00216     void Unflag();
00217 
00221     bool IsFlagged() const;
00222 
00228     void SetAttribute(double attribute);
00229 
00233     double GetAttribute();
00234 
00241     unsigned GetUnsignedAttribute();
00242 };
